text: Taio Cruz (born 23 April 1980) is an English R&B; singer. He started his career by writing songs for other singers. Cruz has released three studio albums and his single, "Break Your Heart" which was featured on his Rokstarr album was a number one hit in both the UK and the USA. In 2014 he released his fourth album called #Black. == Albums == Taio Cruz has released 3 studio albums: Year Album 2008 Departure 2009 Rokstarr 2011 TY.O ==References== ==Other websites== *Taio Cruz's Official website Category:1980 births Category:Black British musicians Category:Brit Award winners Category:British R&B; musicians Category:Singers from London Category:Living people Category:English electropop singers
title: Taio Cruz
